/config.description: Choose a Share for Radarr configuration. Eg: create a Share called Radarr-config for this purpose alone.
/config.label: Config Storage

/movies.description: Choose a Share for Radarr media library Eg: create a Share called Radarr-library for this purpose alone. You can also assign other media Shares on the system after installation.
/movies.label: Movies location

/downloads.description: Choose a Share for Radarr downloads. Eg: create a Share called Radarr-downloads for this purpose alone.
/downloads.label: Download Storage

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run Radarr as. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID to run Radarr as.

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID to run Radarr as.

Radarr.description: Radarr is a movie downloader for usenet
